text: Ra timi smarana gara tyasa samayala'i ki allahale timila'i adako jatipachi uttaradhikari banayo ra prthvima timila'i yo sthana pradana garyo ki aja timile allahako samatala bhumima mahala bana'umchau ra pahadaharula'i katachamta gari ghara bana'umdachau. Allahaka varadanaharula'i smarana gara ra prthvima upadrava gardai nahinda
